resource:fish.name: Fish and Chips
resource:fish.description: A small gill-bearin' animal that otta's are quite fond of munching down on, innit?

resource:wood.name: Wood
resource:wood.description: A sturdy material for crafts, such as tea tables and picture frames of the king!

resource:stone.name: Stone
resource:stone.description: A hard material for crafts, such as a royal chalice or a picture frame of the late queen!

resource:aluminium.name: Aluminium
resource:aluminium.description: A tin for regal crafts, such as tea cups and picture frames of the king!

resource:souls_of_the_innocent.name: Souls (Pure)
resource:souls_of_the_innocent.description: Souls of those with a jolly good pure heart, I say! Each bloomin' full soul collected sets off a jolly catastrophic event, by Jove! It's enough to make the teacups rattle and the crumpets jump off the plate, what with all the hubbub, you see. It's a right royal mess, fit for the king himself, I dare say!

command:find_fish.name: Find Fish
command:find_fish.description: Search for a fish to munch on! Pair with chips for a proper meal, by Jove!
